name: Rollback
description:
You're A Little Thing That Fell to the bottom.
Because you are a little different from other beings.
If you go up here, you can get a chance.

A Chance to Be Like other Beings.


This game is a game that goes up to the top by moving and jumping.
Use various objects and collect items while avoiding danger.
If there is a blockage in the game, find a place where you can use the acquired items.

And this game is not friendly.
If you make a small mistake, you will fall to the bottom.

But don't be too disappointed or frustrated.
Failure is not the end.
